column5: YTA BIG TIME!! Friends move away all the time and people move on in their lives. You need to stop bothering your dad. Seriously question your mental illness . You are a classic example of a spoiled rotton brat who is not getting her way so she decides to get devious about the situation. Grow the hell up.

Looks and sounds mouthwatering
 Thank you for sharing the recipe.

Yes its ok to want to die. As someone with mental illness its a thought that passes thru my head at times. Yes so many are dealing with  tough times right now but plz sit and have a good talk with God. Put everything in front and pray pray pray as I will be praying for you. Blessings
My goodness that is a real cookie. Looks delicious.
Beautiful
Looks ðŸ˜‹ delicious!!!
Thats amazing
I would love some of that . Looks too delicious!!!
That looks delicious
LOL!!!
Yep been doing it this way for 40 years . Works perfect.
Beautiful. Very well done

That is
 beautiful

We have enough hate in the world , please dont start it here
 God love us all , even you.
Lovely , hope he enjoyed it.
You ( Or your mom actually does) SSA .They can give you more direct answers.
Thank you so much and your pie is beautiful.
That is a cool pic and the crust is beautiful. Got a recipe plz?
NTA Shes a brat. Dump her or she will be blaming you for everything ( If she isnt already)
Perfect
Decorated beautifully.
There is a way. You can tell your are filing a police report about your opened mail . That may get him to leave on his own. Make a stink about it too.
You did good . Looks delicious
Love it!!
Well you did good.
Never thought but I do pray so I guess Im one
I've had Prayer angels and war angels with me forever.
NTA And you need to contact gofundme ASAP. They are wise to these scams. Blessings and prayers for your lost

NTA Dont let people tell you to give her a brake because of mental illness. As I live with mental illness I do not give excuses. It seems you are safe with your dad. Move on from your mom, you can love her from afar but dont let her bad times affect your happiness. Blessings
Hope for the best.
God gives us free will. We all have a choice.
Have you called unemployment to ask these questions ? I know its a long wait but they would give you the most direct answer.
Never heard of them. These are next on my list. Thanks for posting and they do look delicious.
That looks delucious.
What airlines did you use?
This is disgusting.
Beautiful

NHA From someone who has epilepsy and who had a friend ( Whos license got pulled and continued to drive) who had a seizure while driving and is now in PRISON doing 3 years for vehicleler homocide because of it. Stick too your guns with him.
You ever thought of smiling and saying hello ? It could be they think your just as weird too.
Wow the roses are perfect , the whole cake is perfect.
LOLOLOLOL!!! My goodness hope he was delicious
You nailed it . Looks delicious

NTA MY GOD your parents could of been my parents . I hate to tell you this but you can kiss that money goodby as they most likely continue to come up with more reasons on why not to pay you. Think of this as a hard lessons and the next time they ask just say "NO".
NTA And start thinking if this is what you really want for a partner. She is showing some huge red flags here.
Will do andbe praying for you and your mom too.
Hi , These folks told her it was going to be done free of charge . Sald it was something they do to help the low income and disabled ( Sorry didnt put that in earlier) and for tax write offs.
NTA You must be in that country west of the Mississippi River where they dont observe manners on the side walk but still NTA cause those folks didnt even have common sense..
YTA And I would like to add a very good dose of narcissist behaviour you have there too. You need to be talking to a professional .

NTA And good for you standing up to him. What you are to him is a second checking account( or 3rd or 4th but who knows) and only a friend until that first time he asked money. Thats how people like him live and the best thing you can do is already done and thats you telling him what you did. I make it a habit of telling "Friends" that I dont loan money unless i have known you for at least a year and even then its $5 every 6 months.
NTA But you will be if you continue to enable him cause thats what you are doing.
That is beautiful
Your friend is acting like a spoiled rotton brat . Id she is that sensitive to this she should of never had kids to begin with. You did nothing wrong and I would find a new friend.
Congrats on opening a bakery. Do you have a blog telling your journey?
Your the AH BIG TIME!! Shame on you for being so selfish.
I'm in love
NTA And good for you for putting the little bitch in the place she needed to be.
NTA And congratulations on the sale
NTA and is there somewhere else you can put these cars out of her reach ?
Is ir just your dad thinking this or the entire family? NTA
Nah but next time tell them you help ship cars around the country which you do do with some of the cars.
Oh my goodness how different.
So NTA and I would live to see am update on this.
Praying for you. Please check some food banks in your area.
You are a pro!!!
Darling . Great job
WOW That has delicious all over it. Looks wonderful
That is amazing
You did great. Very pretty
Your not a bag of crap. Your a human being that has a very high dose of narcissist behavior. Please get help .

NTA He has you right where he wants you and thats control. He is NOT GOING TO CHANGE. You can stay and it will get worst or you can call the national domestic hotline 1800-799-7233 and talk to them . Its abuse and please call.
YTA bit in a very very good way
Did they take a pic of your id\sscard when you got started work?? If they did than that can get you started.

The next time he does it yell very loudly and tell him to knock it the fuck off . Tell him its sexual assualt and you will call the police . hopefully that should scare him. Just keep confronting him anytime he does it.
My brother went thru this and he moved the tv to his bedroom, they were gone in a week.
NTA and i would change the password to netflux and all those other services you are paying for.
You ate very well.

NTA As of now she is your birthmom and thats as far as it goes. She gave up that right to you and your feelings when she chose the life she chose. Now that you are grown she thinks she can come in a demand you tell her you love her. That is a very far reach for her. Good luck with her but I would write her and explain to her just where she stands in your life and why.
I talk very littlle to them. Its exhausting and I know thats not how God wants us to represent him. Again thank you for posting.
You just nailed 2 members of my family, this is who they are. Thank you for posting . i inderstand a whole lot now. Blessings.
Word!!!!!
YTA BIG-TIME and i hope he ends it with you because you deserve it ms.sensitive
Michigan
Thanks
That is a great looking cake for a 3 year old. Good job
Beautiful
Is there a recipe to this plz. Thanks you
NTA NTA NTA You are the HERO here for realizing you can not trust him and doing something about it. Move on.
NTA it's called tough love and it's an option loving parents get to use sometimes. You did nothing wrong and hope things get better.

NTA As a daughter who has been thru this it's okay for you to close the door and move on. I have two sisters and she worships the ground they walk on. It took her doing this one too many times but I would encourage you to talk to someone. This is not your fault so don't carry any blame. Blessings
Legally I can't help you but these days Health Dept. now offer dental services. Call and ask.
You should replace these along with something nicer for her birthday. Hasn't anyone tought you that if it isn't yours don't touch??? There's no accident here . You did it on purpose.
NTA I bake from home(Clean house) a lot and would appreciate if someone told me this. You did the right thing here.
NTA But offer her a trade off. She volunteers an hour a week somewhere.

NTA But next year do what I did with my nephew's. Got a pack of thank you cards and wrapped it in a big box. Yea they were pissed but that was 10 years ago and I have always received a thank you from them since.
NTA If they live in the same city just use a delivery service to drop it off .
This is very nicely done.
Upvote here, that looks delicious.
Perfection.
I have never been a fan of her. NEVER
That's beautiful.
